tag_message: added Wordpress plugin with Android client
added support for SQLite and PostgreSQL, thanks Brent Fraser
added European decimal handling to updatelocation, thanks Wim
reverted back to original ios UI
Responsive design using bootstrap. Clients now using GET request.
Fixed android intervals not working above one minute and removed adsense ads publisher id
Fixed zoom buttons on google map from freezing server app. Updated leaflet to v0.7.3
android app now has single tracking button

Android client app now supports google play in a background service and will resume location updates if phone is rebooted. Both servers now support Google maps, Bing maps and OpenStreetMaps. Also, all xml has been replaced by json. And google maps 3 is now being used
version 3 with support for android, ios, windows phone and java me
version 2 with j2me support only, use v3.0.0
